tuv.seg: Breakdown of a marriage or other relationship
Cliseadh pósta nó caidrimh
The breakdown of a marriage or other relationship is a difficult and traumatic process
Is próiseas deacair agus trámach atá i gcliseadh pósta nó caidrimh
There are many different issues to be addressed such as financial support, the family home and parenting of children
Tá go leor saincheisteanna éagsúla le plé, tacaíocht airgeadais, teach an teaghlaigh agus tuismitheoireacht na leanaí ina measc
Trying to sort out these issues can be very stressful
Bíonn go leor struis i gceist le réiteach na saincheisteanna seo
If the relationship has become abusive, you may need to get a safety or barring order
Má thagann an chuma air go bhfuil an caidreamh faighte éagórach, d’fhéadfaí go bhfuil ort ordú urchoisc nó sábháilteachta a fháil
If you are married, there are a number of legal options following a marital breakdown
Má tá tú pósta, tá roinnt roghanna dlíthiúla ann tar éis chliseadh pósta
The options available are:
Is iad na roghanna atá ar fáil ná:
A court can also grant a nullity decree which is a declaration that a valid marriage never existed
Is féidir le cúirt foraithne neamhnithe a dheonú freisin, is é sin ná dearbhú nach raibh pósadh bailí riamh ann
In a marriage, there is a legal responsibility on both spouses to maintain each other and any children in accordance with their means
I bpósadh, tá freagracht dhlíthiúil ar an mbeirt chéilí a gcéile agus aon leanaí atá acu a chothú de réir a n-acmhainne
This means that any settlement agreed or imposed by the court should include a maintenance agreement
Ciallaíonn sé seo gur chóir comhaontú cothabhála a bheith mar chuid d’aon réiteach arna aontú nó arna chur i bhfeidhm ag an gcúirt
The issue of what happens to the family home also arises
Tagann ceist chun cinn freisin maidir lena dtarlóidh do theach an teaghlaigh
Separation or divorce may have tax implications
D’fhéadfadh impleachtaí cánach a bheith i gceist le hidirscaradh nó le colscaradh
It is important to understand the different taxation options available and how maintenance payments affect taxation
Tá sé tábhachtach na roghanna cánachais éagsúla atá ar fáil a thuiscint chomh maith leis an gcaoi a rachaidh íocaíochtaí cothabhála i bhfeidhm ar chánachas
You may need to get specialist tax advice before entering into arrangements that have capital gains tax implications
D’fhéadfadh go dteastódh sainchomhairle cánach uait sula nglacann tú le socrú ag a bhfuil impleachtaí ar cháin ghnóthachan caipitiúil
Married parents are automatically joint guardians of their children
Is comhchaomhnóirí dá leanaí atá i dtuismitheoirí pósta
Separation or divorce does not change this
Ní athraíonn idirscaradh ná colscaradh an méid sin
However, separation and divorce do have implications for custody and access to children
Bíonn impleachtaí ag scaradh agus colscaradh ar chaomhnóireacht agus rochtain ar na leanaí
The options available to those in civil partnerships where there is a breakdown in the relationship are similar to those available to married couples
Tá na roghanna atá ar fáil dóibh siúd i bpáirtnéireachtaí sibhialta áit a bhfuil cliseadh sa chaidreamh cosúil leo siúd atá ar fáil do lanúineacha phósta
The courts are able to grant a decree of nullity of civil partnership in broadly the same way as decrees of nullity of marriage are granted
Tá na cúirteanna in ann foraithne neamhnithe de pháirtnéireacht shibhialta, a bhronnadh sa bhealach céanna go leathan a bhronntar foraitheanta neamhnithe do phósadh
The courts are also able to dissolve civil partnerships in a similar way to the granting of divorce, but the rules governing the dissolution of civil partnerships are different

Tá na cúirteanna in ann chomh maith páirtnéireachtaí sibhialta a dhíscaoileadh ar bhealach cosúil le bronnadh colscartha, ach tá na rialacha a rialaíonn díscaoileadh pháirtnéireachtaí sibhialta difriúil
The rights of cohabiting couples are in general not recognised in Irish law
Níl cearta lánúineacha comhchónaithe aitheanta i ndlí na hÉireann go ginearálta
If the relationship breaks down, this has important implications for such things as property ownership
Má chliseann an caidreamh, tá impleachtaí tábhachta ann do leithéidí rudaí ar nós úinéireacht réadmhaoine
There is a redress scheme for cohabiting couples who have been in a long-term relationship or who have had children
Tá scéim shásaimh do lánúineacha comhchónaithe a bhí i gcaidreamh fadtéarmach nó a raibh leanaí acu
Where there are children, issues of custody, guardianship and access to the children are likely to arise
Sa chás go bhfuil leanaí ann, is dóigh go dtiocfaidh saincheisteanna chun cinn maidir le coimeád, caomhnóireacht agus rochtain ar na leanaí
Also, while unmarried parents do not have a financial responsibility to maintain each other, both parents are responsible for the maintenance of their children
Ina theannta sin, cé nach bhfuil freagracht airgeadais ag tuismitheoirí neamhphósta a chéile a chothú, tá an bheirt tuismitheoirí freagrach as cothabháil a gcuid leanaí
A separation, divorce or breakdown of a non-marital relationship can result in a one-parent family
Is féidir teaghlach aontuismitheora a bheith mar thoradh ar scaradh, ar cholscaradh nó ar chliseadh caidrimh neamhphósta
There are a range of benefits and entitlements available to lone parents as well as organisations offering support
Tá réimse sochair agus teidlíochtaí ar fáil do thuismitheoirí aonair chomh maith le heagraíochtaí a chuireann tacaíocht ar fáil
For example, One-Parent Family Payment is a payment for men and women who are bringing children up without the support of a partner
Mar shampla, is íocaíocht d’fhir agus do mhná atá ag tógáil leanaí gan tacaíocht ó pháirtí atá san Íocaíocht do Theaghlach Aon-Tuismitheora
Further information is available in our document: Parenting alone
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad: Tuismitheoireacht aonair
If the relationship is abusive or violent, a barring, safety or protection order may be required
Má tá mí-úsáid nó foréigean i gceist i gcaidreamh, d’fhéadfadh go mbeadh gá le hordú urchoisc, ordú sábháilteachta nó ordú cosanta

Information on domestic and sexual violence as well as information on local and national support services is available from Cosc - The National Office for the Prevention of Domestic, Sexual and Gender-based Violence

Tá faisnéis maidir le foréigean baile agus foréigean gnéis chomh maith le faisnéis faoi sheirbhísí tacaíochta áitiúla agus náisiúnta ar fáil ó Cosc - An Oifig Náisiúnta um Fhoréigean Baile, Gnéasach agus Inscnebhunaithe a Chosc
If you are concerned about violence in your home, you should contact your local Garda Station
Má tá imní ort faoi fhoréigean i do bhaile, ba chóir duit dul i dteagmháil le do Stáisiún Gardaí áitiúil
Contact details for your local Garda station are available on the Garda Síochána website
D’fhéadfá cuairt a thabhairt ar do dhochtúir teaghlaigh freisin
You could also visit your family doctor who, apart from dealing with any possible injuries, can provide information on counselling and other supports
Is féidir leis nó léi faisnéis a chur ar fáil maidir le comhairleoireacht agus tacaí eile, chomh maith le haon ghortuithe a láimhseáil
To apply for a barring order or a safety order you must go to your local District Court Office
Ní mór duit dul chuig d’Oifig Cúirte Dúiche chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar ordú urchoisc nó ordú sábháilteachta
Contact details for your local District Court office are available from the Courts Service
Tá sonraí teagmhála d’oifige Cúirte Dúiche áitiúla ar fáil ón tSeirbhís Chúirteanna
International child abduction occurs when a child is unlawfully removed from a country or unlawfully retained in a country
Tarlaíonn fuadach idirnáisiúnta leanaí nuair a thógtar leanbh ó thír go neamhdhlíthiúil nó nuair a choinnítear leanbh go neamhdhlíthiúil i dtír

The Irish Centre for Parentally Abducted Children (ICPAC) publishes an ICPAC Prevention Pack which provides information on the steps you should take if your child is at risk of abduction. Reunite International, a UK charity, also provides child abduction prevention guides on its website

Foilsíonn Ionad na hÉireann do Leanaí arna bhFuadach ag Tuismitheoir (ICPAC) an ICPAC Prevention Pack (Pacáiste Coiscthe) a thugann faisnéis faoi na céimeanna ar chóir duit a ghlacadh má tá baol ann go bhfuadófar do leanbh
Legal and other supports
Tacaí dlí agus tacaí eile
The Family Mediation Service provides a free service that helps separating couples co-operate with each other in working out mutually acceptable arrangements
Cuireann an tSeirbhís Idirghabhála Teaghlaigh seirbhís saor in aisce ar fáil a chabhraíonn le lánúin atá ag scaradh comhoibriú lena chéile chun teacht ar chomhaontuithe atá sásúil don dá thaobh
The Child and Family Agency funds voluntary organisations that provide marriage and relationship counselling
Cuireann an An Ghníomhaireacht um Leanaí agus an Teaghlach maoiniú ar fáil le haghaidh eagraíochtaí deonacha a chuireann comhairleoireacht pósta agus caidrimh ar fáil
The Mediators Institute of Ireland can provide a list of private accredited mediators
Is féidir le hInstitiúid Idirghabhálaithe na hÉireann liosta d’idirghabhálaithe creidiúnaithe príobháideacha a chur ar fáil
Legal aid and advice is available from the Legal Aid Board in family law cases to people who satisfy a means test and whose case is considered to have merit
Tá comhairle agus cúnamh dlí ar fáil ón mBord um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil i gcásanna dlí teaghlaigh do dhaoine a shásaíonn tástáil acmhainne agus a gceaptar go bhfuil fiúntas lena gcás
If you wish to engage the services of a solicitor privately, the Law Society of Ireland maintains a list of solicitor firms throughout the country
Más mian leat aturnae a cheapadh go príobháideach, coinníonn Dlí-Chumann na hÉireann liosta de ghnólachtaí aturnae ar fud na tíre
FLAC is an independent, voluntary organisation that operates a network of legal advice clinics throughout the country
Is eagraíocht neamhspleách, deonach atá in FLAC a fheidhmíonn gréasán de chlinicí comhairle dlí ar fud na tíre
These clinics are confidential, free of charge and open to all
Tá na clinicí rúnda, saor in aisce agus oscailte do chách
Contact your nearest Citizens Information Centre for information on FLAC services in your area
Téigh i dteagmháil leis an Ionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh chun faisnéis a fháil maidir le seirbhísí FLAC i do cheantar
